text: Barbara Luddy (May 25, 1908 - April 11, 1979) was an American actress. == Biography == Luddy was born in Great Falls, Montana to Will and Molly Luddy. == Personal life == Luddy married to R. Ned LeFevre and had two children Barbara and Chris LeFevre. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1908 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Actors from Montana Category:American movie actors Category:American radio actors Category:American silent movie actors Category:People from Great Falls, Montana Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in California
title: Barbara Luddy
